document.heading: Neighborhood Contractor Daytime Parking Permit Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-254, the “Neighborhood Contractor Daytime Parking Permit Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-607. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 10, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-590 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-254 became effective on Apr. 20, 2013.
